experience.title: Sponsorship and Marketing Head
experience.description: • Led a 60 member apex-team of Gymkhana, responsible for the ideation, execution and overall coordination of first ever virtual edition of Spring Fest• Individually garnered sponsorship amounting to INR 14L through corporate deals and successfully onboarded BookMyShow as Title Sponsor of the Fest• Restructured the vtour.tv virtual platform and strategized marketing initiatives, branding channels, and tailored events for the onboarded sponsors

projects: [{"title":"Advance Quantitative Tool for Traders","start_date":"May 2022","end_date":"Sep 2024","description":"Objective: To develop a web application using streamlit framework that aids traders in market analysis and decision-making• Build an interactive multi-functional web application utilizing a streamlit framework for monitoring and analyzing the data of various financial instruments• Implemented a forecasting component using Facebook prophet to predict the closing price of 400+ equities and 15+ crypto tokens up to 5 years"},{"title":"Strategic Analysis of Cross-Border Mergers and Acquisitions: Insights from Global Trends and Reliance Industries' M&A Strategies\"","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"May 2022","description":"Objective:To identify optimal inorganic growth strategies by analyzing historical cross border mergers acquisition transactions• Carried out extensive research using tracxn and ProwessIQ to identify key cross border M&A deals across the various industries such as IT, education• Analysed the global trends of greenfields investments and cross border M&A across various sectors of developed and developing economies• Formulated an exclusive report on strategies used by Reliance Industries for M&A and performed a detailed ratio analysis of pre and post merger"}]
